NewTest.title: Create a New Test
NewTest.description: Build a fun and interactive test for your learners.
NewTest.updateDescription: Update the fun and interactive test for your learners.

step1.title: Test Details
step1.description: Add basic information about your test.

step2.title: Add Questions
step2.description: Create the questions your learners will answer.

step3.title: Upload Test Cover
step3.description: Upload a cover image to represent your test visually.

step4.title: Review & Publish
step4.description: Check all the details and publish your test.

NewTest.question: Question
NewTest.correctAnswerPoints: Each Correct answer from {level} level gives you +{points}P

NewBlog.title: Create a New Blog
NewBlog.description: Share knowledge and insights with your audience.

step1.title: Blog Details
step1.description: Add basic information about your blog.

step2.title: Write Content
step2.description: Create the content for your blog post.

step3.title: Upload Cover
step3.description: Add a cover image to visually represent your blog.

step4.title: Attach Quiz (Optional)
step4.description: Add a quiz to engage readers if you like.

step5.title: Preview & Publish
step5.description: Check everything and publish your blog.

oneOption.title: Select One Option
oneOption.description: Select correct option from many options

orderWords.title: Order Words
